subject: The Best All New Dating Site on the Net - Check it Out!
body:
The Best All New Dating 
Site on the Net - Check it Out!  
SinglesNet: 
  Online Dating Made Easy!
This site will cost you Absolutely Nothing to:
* view pictures
  * send e-mails to members 
  * receive e-mails from members 
  * reply to e-mails from members
**No Credit Card Required**
Takes 
  less than 30 seconds to create an account. 
You will not be asked to leave your phone #.
 

-----------------------------------------------------
To 
  stop receiving announcements
SinglesNet.com 

  13A Highland Circle 
  Needham, MA 02494
